author: barnabasbusa

author: barnabasbusa

author: parithosh
content:
I added [blobber](https://github.com/marioevz/blobber/pull/43) to the network on lighthouse-geth-2 ðŸ˜„


For those who weren't around for Deneb testing, blobber is a MITM tool that sits between the VC and the CL. You can configure it to do a few things:
- Delay blob gossip
- Propose equivocating blob sidecars
- Propose conflicting blobs
We're yet to test the last two after refactoring + adding fulu support. But i set it up with Blob gossip delay for now. 

I added a delay of 3s, so it sort of witholds blobs for 3s. Seems like this is fine for the network sometimes, the rest of the times the slot is just orphaned. I'd have assumed that in such a small network a 3s delay is fine, am i wrong in the assumption? Are our overheads now too high that 1s before the attestation deadline is basically too late?

author: parithosh
content: (also in itself this node didnt seem insanely healthy before i setup blobber on it, it was mostly missing or proposing. But atleast now its proposing but orphaning ðŸ˜… - are there some other bugs at play here too? )

author: parithosh
content: Reduced the delay to 1s to brute force when things start breaking (and disabled mev boost on this node)

author: pawandhananjay
content: ohh this is very interesting. does this withold only blobs or blocks as well? is getBlobs disabled?

author: parithosh
content:
oo i didnt touch the original logic, so i actually don't know. <@892053833121923094> wrote that bit ðŸ˜„ (I just added fulu support)

I think it witholds the entire block, otherwise with getBlobs we shouldn't see any effect at all

author: marioevz
content: Let me see if I can figure it out, do you know which action is the blobber configured with?

author: parithosh
content: the delay one ðŸ˜„

author: marioevz
content:
Got it, according to the description it should broadcast the block, then delay, and then broadcast the blobs:
```
- Sign the block
- Generate the blob sidecars using signed header
- Broadcast the block
- Insert a delay of %d milliseconds
- Broadcast the blob sidecars
```

author: pawandhananjay
content: so there was no suppression of getBlobs? are the blobs being witheld from the mempool somehow?

author: marioevz
content: getBlobs should still be happening, the blobber cannot withhold the blobs on the EL side because it requires the EL to build the block, and the EL is not disconnected from the other ELs

author: pawandhananjay
content:
I think there's some issue with your script. From the logs on lighthouse-geth-2
```
Jul 18 18:38:00.007 DEBUG Block production request from HTTP API        slot: Slot(160990)
Jul 18 18:38:00.500 DEBUG Produced block on state                       block_size: 48216
Jul 18 18:38:12.005 DEBUG Block production request from HTTP API        slot: Slot(160990) 
Jul 18 18:38:12.006 ERROR Producing block at incorrect slot             slot: 160990, current_slot: 160991, msg_id: "check clock sync, this block may be orphaned"
Jul 18 18:38:13.706 DEBUG Signed block received in HTTP API             slot: 160990 
Jul 18 18:38:13.732 INFO  Signed block published to network via HTTP API  slot: 160990, publish_delay_ms: 26
```
it seems like you're holding off for an entire slot before publishing the signed block
